events.message: The insured reported a car accident involving a collision with another vehicle at an intersection resulting in significant damage.
Claim has been categorised under auto accident after reviewing the initial report and involved keywords such as vehicle collision.
An agent has been assigned to the case to handle all communications and coordinate the claims process efficiently.
Acknowledgement sent to policyholder confirming receipt of the auto accident claim for further investigation.
Requested police report, photographs of vehicle damage, and a copy of the driver's statement to proceed with claim assessment.
Received all required documents including police report, photos, and statements required for claim evaluation.
Investigation initiated to verify circumstances of the reported auto accident and assess vehicle damage.
Completed investigation confirming policyholder was not at fault and damage estimates were verified by adjusters.
Proposed settlement amount to cover repair costs presented to policyholder for review and acceptance.
Policyholder provided positive feedback on the timely communication and resolution approach during claim processing.
Claim has been formally approved including the proposed settlement for vehicle repairs under policy terms.
Settlement payment issued to policyholder's designated account to cover all authorized vehicle repair expenses.
All matters resolved and claim officially closed following successful issuance of payment and policyholder confirmation.
Case files and all related documentation archived in the system for future reference and compliance requirements.
